translations: n.[生理]感觉；意义；理智；判断力（sense 的复数）
v.理解；感到；认识（sense 的单三形式）

phrs.translation: n. 五官感觉（指视、听、触、嗅、味五种感觉）

sentences.sentence: He was a true friend in all senses of the word.
sentences.translation: 从任何意义上来说他都是位真正的朋友。

sentences.sentence: When she lost her sight, her other senses grew more acute.
sentences.translation: 失明以后，她的其他感官变得更加敏锐了。

sentences.sentence: Eventually the world will come to its senses and get rid of them.
sentences.translation: 最终这个世界会恢复理智，除掉它们。
